name: LIFEHACKSwithTheWealthyTrainerNEWS
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Being broke, unhealthy and uneducated makes life harder. Welcome to LIFE HACKS with The Wealthy Trainer NEWS, where Marc Lalonde (aka The Wealthy Trainer) shares some LIFE HACKS that have brought him from being homeless, overweight and lost; to becoming rich, fit and educated. If you could use a few more dollars, need to shed a couple of pounds, or feel like you have no real direction in life, this NEWS is for you. Covering (but not limited to) WEALTH HACKS (Online Marketing / Personal Branding / Social Media / Blogging / Consulting / Sales / Network Marketing / Affiliate Marketing / Entrepreneurship / Small Business), HEALTH HACKS (Wellness / Fitness / Nutrition), and RANDOM HACKS (Life Experiences / Lessons Learned / Random Stuff). The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
